name: Fantasy Fight LIVE!
summary:
Fantasy Fight LIVE is an overlay game utilizing a browser source where viewers can join random duels or challenge each other while watching you stream. 
Viewer-Controlled heroes will appear on the stream (configurable by the streamer) and fight each other until a winner is clear. 
The players can level up and collect items to create and customize their very own hero OR they simply use a pre-created default hero. 
 
The duels in Fantasy Fight LIVE follow a Rock-Paper-Scissors mechanic: Melee beats Magic - Magic beats Parry - Parry beats Melee 
Duels are running a Best-Of-X strategy.
